name: Klajjer
description:
Game Version: 0.2.1

Controls: 

Move: WASD

Run: Shift

Jump: Spacebar

Menu: M

First Person: I

Third Person: O

Menu Music: Beethoven Alla Turca

Game Music: Beethoven Rage over a lost penny

Description:

This game is basically just doing parkour and other stuff. I am going to keep adding levels until I feel like it is done. I might try to program a level maker. I am still new to making games so don't be too critical. The UI is fine. It works so it's good.
